Summary: Mass sighting in progress 10:30-noon EDT small spheres streaming towards sun.
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around June 30th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsat 10:30 EDT a Lafayatte witness called to say she was seeing spheres streaming towards sun. Wife went outside and used building to block direct sun disk but could see the spheres streaming towards sun mostly from west towards sun. One instance there was one that split into two. Other times there were handfuls streaming to sun all at once. This sighting is still ongoing with other witnesses from Kokomo, Peru, Lafayette, and Indianapolis all reporting same occurence. Pictures will be uploaded for this case later.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
